title: The case of the founders kinsmen with relation to the statutes of ---------- College, in the University of ----------- / humbly proposed and submitted to better judgments.
author: Cawley, J. (John), 1632?-1709.
notes: Attributed to J. Cawley as referring to All Souls College, Oxford University--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
